original_text:
By warfare and exile you contend with her—
    with his fierce blast he drives her out,
    as on a day the east wind blows.
korean_text: 주께서 백성을 적당하게 견책하사 쫓아내실 때에 동풍 부는 날에 폭풍으로 그들을 옮기셨느니라

sentences.original_text: By warfare and exile you contend with her
with his fierce blast he drives her out
as on a day the east wind blows
